name: Transcendent Automaton
title: Marionette Swordmaster
desc: That unerring strike has been delivered countless times.
inPlayDescription: After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Frosty Assault.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Maguu Kenki at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Maguu Kenki, equip this card.After Maguu Kenki equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Blustering Blade once.After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Frosty Assault.(You must have Maguu Kenki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
